propDescriptions.children: The content of the table, normally TableHead and TableBody.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.padding: Allows TableCells to inherit padding of the Table.
propDescriptions.size: Allows TableCells to inherit size of the Table.
propDescriptions.stickyHeader:
Set the header sticky.
⚠️ It doesn't work with IE11.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.
